data.actual_result: Message isn't deleted System Settings: Win10 x64, Canary
data.expected_result: Message is deleted as if you pressed Delete
data.short_description: Pressing `enter` while the "Delete Message" popup is open does nothing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Press the up arrow while in the chat to edit your latest message - Delete everything and press enter - Press the enter key while the delete message popup is showing
